page.title: 16MOBILITY
page.content: There is no regular bus service, every -one relies on cars,mopeds,bicycles or lifts from friends & neighbours to the shops, Post Office(for pensions) Doctors surgery is in the next village -Brailsford.Bus service from Ashbourne to Derby passes through Brailsford. A market bus leaves Websters garage,Hog- naston via Hulland Ward,Mercaston Stoop to Derby on Friday.Grocer in Brailsford will deliver groceries if asked.The same difficulty applies for getting to the cinema or Theatre in Derby,Women's Institute or Council Meetings in Brailsford. It follows that teenagers get on to 2 or 4 wheels as soon as possible. One 8yr old helps bring in the cattle, riding his scramble bike across the fields.
